Author: algorthin
Text: remember that nobody can force you to go to the hospital. your drop in weight is concerning because of your illness, and when you show that it's coincidental and that you haven't relapsed by getting your weight back on track he'll change his tune. focus on what you need to do and don't worry on the possibility of being hospitalized. it'll be okay
